bwwExcerpt: As inventively staged by wunderkind director Alex Timbers ("Rocky," "Peter and the Starcatcher"), "Here Lies Love" is a high-energy, immersive experience not unlike "Sleep No More" and "Fuerza Bruta" where audience members stand throughout the show and can freely move around. But it is also a smart, edgy musical about a celebrity-seeking political leader, her rags-to-riches journey, the corruption of her regime and her relationship with those around her.
